data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gante, Hugo F., Santos, Carlos D., Alves, Maria Judite (2007): A new species of Chondrostoma Agassiz, 1832 (Cypriniformes: Cyprinidae) with sexual dimorphism from the lower Rio Tejo Basin, Portugal. Zootaxa 1616: 23-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179095
